title: Caroline Flack strips down and gets out the booze at the end of a frantic week
text:
Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Love Island presenter Caroline Flack makes no secret of her hard work and hectic lifestyle.

Now the star has marked the end of another week's grind with a naked snap.

The 39 year-old stripped down and parked herself on a kitchen counter, sipping from something that looks very pricey.

Caroline wrote: "Quite a week...we're having a little wrap party."

Some of her 2.3 million followers were quick to gush over the snap, with one writing: "Ooh get you pretty lady."

Another could hardly contain themselves: "You have an amazing body."

A third joked: "Hope you're going to wipe that surface before breakfast."

(Image: carolineflack/Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She had fans worried recently when she appeared to be wrapped in a row with model boyfriend Lewis Burton.

Onboard a yacht in Ibiza, Caroline looked close to tears as she held up Lewis' phone in his face.

Later she held her hands up in the air when he tried to approach her, and crossed her arms as he leaned in.

On Tuesday, she looked a bit down in the dumps as she took a stroll through leafy Hampstead in north London.

She took to Instagram to share that the holiday hadn't gone quite as planned, writing: "Back from holiday...

"Not quite as relaxing as I thought but ready to jump back into work! NEWWWWW JOB THIS WEEK...all to be revealed soon."

Her positive attitude was matched by her killer style - Caroline rocked a furry parka, leather boots and denim skirt.

She completed the glitzy ensemble with some shades over her eyes.

Fans are unsure what the new job is, but many suspect it might have something to do with the winter edition of Love Island, set to hit telly screens in January.

Caroline's been eager about the project, calling it the "hottest series ever."
description: Caroline posed nude on a kitchen counter with an expensive looking bottle to mark the end of a long week's work
